#summary 3rd parties softwares used by NUL and for NUL
#labels Featured

 * jQuery: jQuery is a fast and concise !JavaScript Library that simplifies HTML document traversing, event handling, animating, and Ajax interactions for rapid web development. We have used jQuery in NUL Consol, NUL !UnitTest, NUL Custom Page Manipulation. More information at [http://jquery.com jQuery's official website].
 * jQuery extensions: - for more information you can visit [http://plugins.jquery.com jQuery's extensions library]
   * includeMany - http://arashkarimzadeh.com/index.php/jquery/17-includemany-jquery-include-many.html
   * treeTable - http://plugins.jquery.com/project/treeTable
   * UI and UI.layout - http://jqueryui.com/
 * !CodeMirror: !CodeMirror is a !JavaScript library that can be used to create a relatively pleasant editor interface for code-like content. Read more at [http://marijn.haverbeke.nl/codemirror CodeMirror website].
 * JS.Class: is a library designed to facilitate object-oriented development in !JavaScript. Find out more at [http://jsclass.jcoglan.com/ JS.Class developer site].
 * jsdoc_toolkit: !JsDoc Toolkit is an application, written in !JavaScript, for automatically generating template-formatted, multi-page HTML (or XML, JSON, or any other text-based) documentation from commented !JavaScript source code. More at [http://code.google.com/p/jsdoc-toolkit the developers Google Code website].
 * !RockstarApps - http://www.rockstarapps.com/
